rukus.text: And (remember) when your Master called Moses: go to the wrongdoing people
people of Pharaoh, (and ask) would they not be cautious (of God)
He said: my Master, I am afraid that they deny me
and my chest becomes tight and my tongue stutters, so send (the message) to Aaron
And they have a charge against me, so I am afraid that they kill me
He (God) said: no way, you two go with Our signs, We are with you, listening
So you two go to Pharaoh and say: indeed we are messengers of the Master of Human kind
send the children of Israel with us
He (Pharaoh) said: did we not bring you up among us as a child, and you stayed among us for years of your life
And you did your work that you did (and committed murder), and you are of the ungrateful ones
He (Moses) said: I did it while I was of the lost ones (from the right path)
then I ran away from you because I was afraid of you, then my Master gave me wisdom and made me of the messengers
And that is a favor that you tell me off about it, that you enslaved children of Israel (and you did not enslave or kill me)
Pharaoh said: and what is Master of humankind
He (Moses) said: Master of the skies and the earth and whatever between them, if you are sure
He said to those around him: do you not hear (what he says)
He (Moses) said: your Master and Master of your forefathers
He said (to the others): your messenger, the one who was sent to you is certainly crazy
He (Moses) said: Master of the east and the west and whatever between them, if you understand
He said: if you take any god other than me, I shall make you of the prisoners
He (Moses) said: even if I bring you something obvious
He said: then bring it, if you are of the truthful ones
So he threw his cane and it immediately was a visible serpent
And he took out his hand, and it was white to the viewers
